introduction: Kevin Shulman is an American award winning film and music video Director and Producer. He was born and raised in Los Angeles, into a Military family, the youngest son of two public school teachers. He began filmmaking in his adolescence and later went to Film School for directing and cinematography at Brooks Insitute of photography in Santa Barbara . While in College he also worked for three time academy award nominee Diane Ladd, until being signed to Raging Nation as a music video Director at age 21. As a Director/ Producer of over 100 music videos he has worked with such artists as Jason Derulo, The Game, Omarion, Billy Morrison and academy award winners Three 6 Mafia. These videos have aired all over the world on MTV, BET and VH1, and racked up millions and millions of hits on Youtube. Kevin is also the director of the critically acclaimed political horror short Eyes of Samir starry Tony Todd , which was called the "The best horror short of 2007" by the Rue Morgue magazine and was call "Provocative and even infuriating" by the Denver Post.
